pages.text: Typically found in dense forests, owls are famed as a symbol of wisdom.

Despite their cumbersome appearance, owls are graceful fliers and lethal hunters. Though they prefer small mammals like squirrels and rabbits, owls have no qualms about dropping down on uncooped chickens.$(br2)Owls find the best companion in worldly witches who travel often.
It's said that familiarized
witches are attuned to the wind, making their work with a broom something to behold.$(2br)$(o)How many licks?
